actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 9, 1977, through October 15, 1977, as "National School Bus Safety Week."

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate October 9, 1977, through October 15, 1977, as "National School Bus Safety Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 9, 1977, through October 15, 1977, as "National School Bus Safety Week."
